description: File search store for document retrieval and semantic search

notes.usage: This configuration is used when creating a new file search store
customization: Update 'display_name' to reflect your use case
Store names are immutable after creation
best_practices: Use clear, descriptive names for easy identification
Separate stores by domain or project
Keep individual stores under 20 GB for optimal performance
Name stores after their content domain (e.g., 'Technical Documentation', 'Legal Contracts')

example_usage.typescript: await ai.fileSearchStores.create({ config: { displayName: 'My RAG Store', description: 'Product documentation store' } })
